data.title: Road Closures and Construction
data.text:
Road Closures

County Roads are occasionally closed due to natural causes as well as planned projects and construction. The Bureau of Highways works to minimize any impact to citizens and those travelling on County Roads.

Capital Projects

Visit the Capital Projects page on the Bureau of Engineering site for the details of projects that may impact roads.

Note: In the event of a full road closure due to a capital project, the record will be listed under Road Closures
